content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you like the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it very convenient and comfortable. Let's discuss the rental price. I'm looking to rent it out for a minimum of 2,000 Euros per month. Remember, I am in no hurry and I can find another tenant if the price is not satisfactory to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the offer, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is higher than I am willing to pay at this time. I hope you find a suitable tenant at your desired price. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
